Posts.EditableText: I made a game on the website version and uploaded it unlisted. It worked okay, but when I pressed upload again to update the game, It wouldn't update. I would just be playing the previous version of my game. If anyone could help me to update my game that would be appriciated. Thank you
Posts.HTML: I made a game on the website version and uploaded it unlisted. It worked okay, but when I pressed upload again to update the game, It wouldn't update. I would just be playing the previous version of my game. If anyone could help me to update my game that would be appriciated. Thank you

Posts.EditableText:
I have experienced the same thing and it is frustrating.  I believe that the textadventures servers do not refresh very often and that is the reason for the delay/lag in seeing your updated version.  I have waited as long as 24 hours to see a change.

I moved my game to a stand alone page and server to get around that frustration.
Posts.HTML:
